author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-1226.  Change HDFS so that paths it returns are always fully qualified.  Contributed by Dhruba.

author: tv
msg: Fixed the hsqldb helper class. It was using Java 1.5 methods (File.toURI()).
Removed the methods supporting URL, they are not used anyway. The sql file
processing was error prone, it didn't care for comments correctly.

author: hlship
msg: Make sure bin-test is marked as svn:ignore

author: bommel
msg: cosmetic: avoid superfluous scrollbars in tabs for Richmond theme and make sure inner dimensions are correctly propagated to tabs, because tabs currently have no default layout manager
